name: template-example
description: ⚠️ TEMPLATE CONFIG - NOT FOR PRODUCTION USE. Copy and modify this template for your own documentation site. Replace URLs, selectors, and categories with your specific requirements.
_instructions: 1. Replace base_url and start_urls with your documentation URLs. 2. Test selectors using browser DevTools. 3. Customize categories based on your docs structure. 4. Adjust rate_limit and max_pages as needed.
